    "### Step 1\n",
    "\n",
    "This first chunk of workflow in a sequencial order.\n",
    "\n",
    "It might start with some linux command:\n",
    "\n",
    "```\n",
    "$ cd ~\n",
    "$ ls -l\n",
    "\n",
    "```\n",
    "\n",
    "The commands above generate an image which is inserted here.\n",
    "\n",
    "![alt text of this image](images/image_name.png)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Step 2\n",
    "\n",
    "In each section, you can futuer divide into several sub-section using more hash tag #.\n",
    "\n",
    "#### step 2.1\n",
    "\n",
    "Some text can be highlighted in colour, e.g., <span style=\"color:red\">red</span>. \n",
    "\n",
    "#### step 2.2\n",
    "\n",
    "Or you can make some text **bold**."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Step 3\n",
    "\n",
    "If you want to post a warning message you can do this:\n",
    "\n",
    "<div class=\"alert alert-warning\">\n",
    "<b>NOTE:</b> The flag '--user' is required so that the package is installed locally. If not included, permission errors will be returned.  \n",
    "</div>\n",
    "\n",
    "If you want to emphasise something you can do this:\n",
    "<div class=\"alert alert-success\">\n",
    "<b> To test whether the install was successful, try: </b> <br>\n",
    "<br>\n",
    "$ python <br>\n",
    ">> import netCDF4 <br>\n",
    ">> <br> <br>\n",
    "(If you get any errors, the install was unsuccessful.)\n",
    "</div>\n",
    "\n",
    "To add any tips or tricks, you can do this:\n",
    "<div class=\"alert alert-info\">\n",
    "<b>Tip: </b> Try to use more than three hash in front of session title. Otherwise, font will appear in huge size.\n",
    "</div>"
   ]
